items.content_html: A lightweight, vanilla JavaScript block explorer for the Cardano blockchain using the Blockfrost API. This project demonstrates building a secure client-server application with real-time blockchain data display.
items.title: Jimmyh-world/cardano-explorer: A lightweight, vanilla JavaScript block explorer for the Cardano blockchain using the Blockfrost API. This project demonstrates building a secure client-server application with real-time blockchain data display.

items.content_html: PuPu is a lightweight tool that makes it easy to run AI models on your own device. Designed for smooth performance and ease of use, PuPu is perfect for anyone who wants quick access to AI without technical complexity.

items.content_html: A lightweight and secure microservice for user authentication and session management. It handles user registration, password management, token-based authentication, and session lifecycle. Designed for scalability and cloud-native systems, it offers flexibility, reliability, and easy integration with role-based access control (RBAC).
items.title: GabrSobral/GateKeeper: A lightweight and secure microservice for user authentication and session management. It handles user registration, password management, token-based authentication, and session lifecycle. Designed for scalability and cloud-native systems, it offers flexibility, reliability, and easy integration with role-based access control (RBAC).

items.content_html: Hashless is a lightweight, high-performance hashing and verification library designed for serverless environments like AWS Lambda and Cloudflare Workers. It provides secure, efficient, and dependency-free hashing solutions optimized for edge computing and cloud-native applications.
items.title: Jenil-Desai/Hashless: Hashless is a lightweight, high-performance hashing and verification library designed for serverless environments like AWS Lambda and Cloudflare Workers. It provides secure, efficient, and dependency-free hashing solutions optimized for edge computing and cloud-native applications.

items.content_html: OpenCSS is a lightweight and versatile CSS utility library designed to streamline your web development process. With OpenCSS, you can easily manage and apply styles to your HTML elements, helping you create modern and responsive web interfaces.
